page.title: 14Cherry Hinton Hall
page.content: Cherry Hinton Hall is along Cherry Hinton Road.It is very big.One of the areas is taken up by two big ponds.They are full of ducks.Some ducks are rare,for instance the Mandarin duck and three other rare ducks from the Far East.Also there are fishes in there.One which is 20cm long is called Jaws by most people. Another part of the park is a play area with swings,roundabouts,climbing frames,slides and a big tyre death slide.Near the swings is a little part like a forest to play in.Cherry Hinton Hall is in between the play area and the pond.It is not open though.Often bands visit the Hall and lots of people come.Each year there is a big Folk Festival where people come from all over the country.It is held in July.
